languages.text: "Ты убила мою родню и скрыла от меня правду. Этому не может быть прощения. Покинь мой отряд. Пусть тебя поглотит Комморра".

traits.locale_text: "Ты убил{mf||а} мою родню и скрыла от меня правду. Этому не может быть прощения. Покинь мой отряд. Пусть тебя поглотит Каморра".

languages.text: "You murdered my kin and hid the truth from me. That is unforgivable. Leave my retinue. May Commorragh take you."
languages.original_text: "Ты убила мою родню и скрыла от меня правду. Этому не может быть прощения. Покинь мой отряд. Пусть тебя поглотит Комморра".

traits.locale_text: "You murdered my kin and hid the truth from me. That is unforgivable. Leave my retinue. May Commorragh take you."
"You murdered my kin and hid the truth from me. That is unforgivable. Leave my retinue. May Commorragh take you."
"You murdered my kin and hid the truth from me. That is unforgivable. Leave my retinue. May Commorragh take you."
"You murdered my kin and hid the truth from me. That is unforgivable. Leave my retinue. May Commorragh take you."
"You murdered my kin and hid the truth from me. That is unforgivable. Leave my retinue. May Commorragh take you."
"You murdered my kin and hid the truth from me. That is unforgivable. Leave my retinue. May Commorragh take you."

languages.text: 「あなたは私のキンを殺害し、私から真実を隠した。許しがたいことだ。私の元から去れ。コモラフがあなたを受けれることを願う」
languages.original_text: "You murdered my kin and hid the truth from me. That is unforgivable. Leave my retinue. May Commorragh take you."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは私のキンを殺害し、私から真実を隠した。許しがたいことだ。私の元から去れ。コモラフがあなたを受けれることを願う」

languages.text: “你杀害了我的亲人，还向我隐瞒了真相，这样的恶行不可原谅。你不配继续留在我身边，愿科摩罗带走你。”
languages.original_text: "You murdered my kin and hid the truth from me. That is unforgivable. Leave my retinue. May Commorragh take you."

traits.locale_text: “你杀害了我的亲人，还向我隐瞒了真相，这样的恶行不可原谅。你不配继续留在我身边，愿科摩罗带走你。”

languages.text: «Asesinó a mi pariente y me ocultó la verdad. Es imperdonable. Abandone mi séquito. Que Commorragh la lleve».
languages.original_text: "You murdered my kin and hid the truth from me. That is unforgivable. Leave my retinue. May Commorragh take you."

traits.locale_text: «Asesinó a mi pariente y me ocultó la verdad. Es imperdonable. Abandone mi séquito. Que Commorragh la lleve».

languages.text: "Ihr habt meine Verwandte getötet und die Wahrheit vor mir verborgen. Das ist unverzeihlich. Verlasst mein Gefolge. Soll Commorragh Euch haben."
languages.original_text: "You murdered my kin and hid the truth from me. That is unforgivable. Leave my retinue. May Commorragh take you."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt meine Verwandte getötet und die Wahrheit vor mir verborgen. Das ist unverzeihlich. Verlasst mein Gefolge. Soll Commorragh Euch haben."

languages.text: « Vous avez assassiné un membre de ma famille et m'avez caché la vérité. C'est impardonnable. Quittez mon entourage sur-le-champ, et que Commorragh vous emporte ! »
languages.original_text: "You murdered my kin and hid the truth from me. That is unforgivable. Leave my retinue. May Commorragh take you."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez assassiné un membre de ma famille et m'avez caché la vérité. C'est impardonnable. Quittez mon entourage sur-le-champ, et que Commorragh vous emporte ! »

languages.text: "Kanımdan birini katledip gerçeği benden sakladın. Affedilecek şey değil bu. Maiyetimde artık yerin yok. Commorragh'ta yitip gidesin."
languages.original_text: "You murdered my kin and hid the truth from me. That is unforgivable. Leave my retinue. May Commorragh take you."

traits.locale_text: "Kanımdan birini katledip gerçeği benden sakladın. Affedilecek şey değil bu. Maiyetimde artık yerin yok. Commorragh'ı boylayasın."
